title: Ruling on having a shop in the Masjid - Assim al hakeem
transcript: I doubt that the matter the local machine that the machine has a shop inside maybe it is within the fence but nobody prays around it or in it because this is not permissible to sell an and buy in the message itself so if we have a corner here this is haram to have a message to have a shop here in the message but outside if it's outside the defense and it's considered to be part of the message this Herald in sha Allah and Allah knows best
